attributes.action: withhold UK funding of UNEP/CITES until TUI are dropped as sponsors of the UN YoD 2007.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
TUI are sponsors of the United Nations Year of the Dolphin 2007.
The main purpose of this UNEP YoD 2007 campaign is supposed to be protecting dolphins in the wild
TUI profit from sending clients to captive dolphin displays which makes a mockery of protecting dolphins in the wild as most of the animals in these displays are sourced from WILD populations.
